If anyone commits impurity with a beast or a man with a man or a woman with a woman, he will forfeit his life and must be sentenced to death at the stake, as is customary at the stake. There were, however, there were very few sentences actually that specifically punished these relationships between women. That is, when that happened it was usually because there was a case of supposed witchcraft of demonesses, as we have already seen, but this is interesting because it was considered that the really serious cases were those in which women had used some kind of sexual instrument during relations, which could be, and this is specified in laws and edicts, it could be leather, wood, glass or any other material.

Entonces se puso de pie detrás de mi silla y se inclineó sobre ella. He said it was always a kiss on the forehead, or on the neck, or on the eyes, or on the cheeks, or on the mouth, or on the hands, or on the breasts, or on the arms, but above all on the mouth. He would tell me that I had wonderful breath, white teeth and fresh, red lips. I don't remember everything she told me, but there must have been some truth in her praises. One day Mother Superior asked her to come into her cell to play some music for her. So I went on and sat down. It seemed to her that I might be cold, so she took a cushion from one of the chairs and put it in front of me. Then she bent down, picked up my feet and put them on top of the cushion.
